articles.summary: Business Insider: A strategist at a $60 billion investment firm says defense stocks are poised to soar. Here are his 5 top picks for 2026.. Scott Helfstein of Gloal X ETFs says defense stocks are poised to soar due to increased federal spending and rising geopolitical uncertainty.
